title: Tickle Fighting and Make-Outs (w/ Nate Craig)
description: Big Jay talks "Tickle Fighting" and the consequences that come with it, Dan and Jay stage a make out in front of Sirius XM and the crowd gets larger than they first thought. Nate Craig joins the show and talks awful comedy condos with the guys and the "Lost At Sea" Tapes comes to a close, with a land recording wrap up.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
